## TransverseMercatorUtils.alignLongitude() method

There are two regions on projected plane, `{ x: 0.5, y: [0..0.25] }` and `{ x: 0.5, y: [0.75..1] }` that represent longitude edge where `-180` and `+180` met. Points falling in this regions should be aligned to get proper boxes etc.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static alignLongitude(points: GeoCoordinatesLike[], referencePoint: GeoCoordinatesLike): void;
```
